verses.verse: I <S%H559>said,<s%> "Please <S%H8085>listen,<s%> you <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H7101>rulers<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H3045>Isn't<s%> it for you to know <S%H4941>justice?<s%>

You who <S%H8130>hate<s%> the <S%H2896>good,<s%> and <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H7451>evil;<s%> who tear <S%H1497>off<s%> their <S%H5785>skin,<s%> and their <S%H7607>flesh<s%> from off their <S%H6106>bones;<s%>

who also <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H7607>flesh<s%> of my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H6584>flay<s%> their <S%H5785>skin<s%> from off <S%H6476>them,<s%> and break their <S%H6106>bones,<s%> and chop them in <S%H6566>pieces,<s%> as for the <S%H5518>pot,<s%> and as <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> the <S%H7037>caldron.<s%>

Then they will <S%H2199>cry<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> but he will not <S%H6030>answer<s%> <S%H5641>them.<s%> Yes, he will hide his <S%H6440>face<s%> from them at that <S%H6256>time,<s%> because they made their <S%H4611>deeds<s%> <S%H7489>evil.<s%>"

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> concerning the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> who lead my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8582>astray;<s%> for those who <S%H5391>feed<s%> their <S%H8127>teeth,<s%> they <S%H7121>proclaim,<s%> <S%H7965>"Peace!<s%>" and whoever <S%H5414>doesn't<s%> provide for their <S%H6310>mouths,<s%> they <S%H6942>prepare<s%> war against <S%H4421>him:<s%>

"Therefore <S%H3915>night<s%> is over <S%H2377>you,<s%> with no vision, and it is <S%H2821>dark<s%> to <S%H7080>you,<s%> that you may not divine; and the <S%H8121>sun<s%> will go <S%H935>down<s%> on the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> and the <S%H3117>day<s%> will be black over <S%H6937>them.<s%>

The <S%H2374>seers<s%> shall be <S%H954>disappointed,<s%> and the <S%H7080>diviners<s%> <S%H2659>confounded.<s%> <S%H5844>Yes,<s%> they shall all cover their <S%H8222>lips;<s%> for there is no <S%H4617>answer<s%> from <S%H430>God.<s%>"

But <S%H199>as<s%> for <S%H4390>me,<s%> I am full of <S%H3581>power<s%> by the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and of <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> and of <S%H1369>might,<s%> to <S%H5046>declare<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> his <S%H6588>disobedience,<s%> and to <S%H3478>Israel<s%> his <S%H2403>sin.<s%>

Please <S%H8085>listen<s%> to <S%H7218>this,<s%> you heads of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H7101>rulers<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> who <S%H8581>abhor<s%> <S%H4941>justice,<s%> and <S%H6140>pervert<s%> all <S%H3477>equity.<s%>

Her <S%H7218>leaders<s%> <S%H8199>judge<s%> for <S%H7810>bribes,<s%> and her <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H3384>teach<s%> for a <S%H4242>price,<s%> and her <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of it tell <S%H7080>fortunes<s%> for <S%H3701>money:<s%> yet they <S%H8172>lean<s%> on <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3068>"Isn't<s%> Yahweh in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H7451>us?<s%> No disaster will come on <S%H935>us.<s%>"

Therefore <S%H6726>Zion<s%> for your <S%H1558>sake<s%> will be <S%H2790>plowed<s%> like a <S%H7704>field,<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> will become <S%H5856>heaps<s%> of <S%H2022>rubble,<s%> and the mountain of the <S%H1004>temple<s%> like the high <S%H1116>places<s%> of a <S%H3293>forest.<s%>
